title: Just for Kicks
overview: Just for Kicks is about a group of girls on a soccer team set in New York City. The series follows the lives of four young women: Lauren, Alexa, Freddie and Vida, as well as Alexa's brother Chris and his friend. Some of the overarching plots include Lauren learning not to be so tightly wound and controlled by her overprotective mother, as well as beginning to date Chris.
